settings.content: We suggest reading through our [documentation](http://help.pixelunion.net/customer/portal/articles/1840423-grid-theme-documentation) , which provides a thorough overview of all the theme's features. It also includes helpful instructions and design tips from the team. If you're confused at any stage, don't hesitate to contact us by sending a quick [email](mailto:support@pixelunion.net) or [tweet](http://twitter.com/pixelunion). We're available Monday through Friday during our office hours, 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. (PST).
Find us on the web: [Pixel Union](http://www.pixelunion.net) | Twitter: [@pixelunion](http://twitter.com/pixelunion) | Facebook: [http://facebook.com/pixelunion](http://facebook.com/pixelunion)
Background image width and height are required for retina images to display correctly. Simply enter the height and width values in pixels, such as "100".

settings.label: Display height (in pixels)
settings.info: This is the height at which the logo is displayed. If this field is left blank, your logo will display 100px high. The image itself may be larger to account for high pixel density (Retina) displays.

settings.label: Show header border
settings.info: This will appear on all pages except the home page.

settings.label: Logo height (in pixels)
settings.info: If you'd like to support retina devices, upload a logo that is twice as tall/wide as the original and enter a height equal to the height of the original logo (in pixels).

settings.label: Text logo color
settings.info: If you're not using a custom logo, this option will set the color of your shop title.

settings.label: Hover interaction on collection product list page

settings.content: The order notes option gives your customers the ability to offer special instructions for shipping on checkout.

The shipping note allows you to display text stating that the cart total does not include taxes or shipping. This text appears just below your cart total, and you can adjust the wording of it through your themes language settings.

settings.label: Show post author avatar
settings.info: We pull author avatars from Gravatar. [More info](http://docs.shopify.com/manual/settings/account/staff-members#change-staff-account-picture)

settings.label: Show share icons on product page
Show Other Store Dropdown on header
Notification message
settings.info: This message is show as suggestion. Add '-Link-' in message to add click link in message. Add '-CountryName-' in message to add dynamic country name in message

settings.label: Show Retail Store Dropdown on header
Enable currency conversion
settings.info: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.default: INR GBP CAD USD AUD EUR JPY
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.
